div.p: Flag_of_South_Korea.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 900 × 600 pixels, file size: 1 KB)

Mìng-dĕ̤ng-ngṳ̄: 大韓民國國旗 / Dâi-hàng Mìng-guók guók-gì
